text:
Part 3 of our #COVID19 vaccine series !

Inactivated vaccines contain killed virus from #SARS_COV_2 to teach our immune systems how to respond to the viral proteins ! 

Read more about how it works below and check out our website for more ! https://t.co/BS9164mESG
